```{r}
tweets1 <- searchTwitter('anxiety', n = 100, lang = 'en', since = "2020-10-17", until = "2020-10-18", resultType = 'popular')
tweets2 <- searchTwitter('anxiety', n = 100, lang = 'en', since = "2020-10-18", until = "2020-10-19", resultType = 'popular')
tweets3 <- searchTwitter('anxiety', n = 100, lang = 'en', since = "2020-10-19", until = "2020-10-20", resultType = 'popular')
tweets4 <- searchTwitter('anxiety', n = 100, lang = 'en', since = "2020-10-20", until = "2020-10-21", resultType = 'popular')
tweets5 <- searchTwitter('anxiety', n = 100, lang = 'en', since = "2020-10-21", until = "2020-10-22", resultType = 'popular')
tweets6 <- searchTwitter('anxiety', n = 100, lang = 'en', since = "2020-10-22", until = "2020-10-23", resultType = 'popular')
tweets7 <- searchTwitter('anxiety', n = 100, lang = 'en', since = "2020-10-23", until = "2020-10-24", resultType = 'popular')
tweets<- rbind(tweets1, tweets2, tweets3, tweets4, tweets5, tweets6, tweets7)
tweetsdf <- twListToDF(tweets)

hourlyData <- tweetsdf %>%
  mutate(hour_posted = floor_date(created, "hour"))%>%
  group_by(hour_posted)%>%
  summarize(avgAnxioustweets = sum(retweetCount))
hourlyData

hourly_ts<- zoo( x = hourlyData$avgAnxioustweets, order.by = hourlyData$hour_posted, frequency = 24)
hourly_ts

autoplot.zoo(hourly_ts, xlab = "Date", ylab = "anxiousTweets")
```
